wiki.summary: On Show of Hands, Future is joined by A$AP Rocky to deliver a fast, boastful track. Although this is the first collaboration between Future and A$AP Rocky since 2016, where they teamed up on A$AP Ferg’s remix of New Level REMIX (feat. Future, A$AP Rocky & Lil Uzi Vert), A$AP Rocky featured on Metro Boomin’s soundtrack for Spiderman: Across the Spider-Verse, on tracks Am I Dreaming (Metro Boomin & A$AP Rocky, Roisee) and Nonviolent Communication (Metro Boomin & James Blake, A$AP Rocky, 21 Savage) Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: On Show of Hands, Future is joined by A$AP Rocky to deliver a fast, boastful track. Although this is the first collaboration between Future and A$AP Rocky since 2016, where they teamed up on A$AP Ferg’s remix of New Level REMIX (feat. Future, A$AP Rocky & Lil Uzi Vert), A$AP Rocky featured on Metro Boomin’s soundtrack for Spiderman: Across the Spider-Verse, on tracks Am I Dreaming (Metro Boomin & A$AP Rocky, Roisee) and Nonviolent Communication (Metro Boomin & James Blake, A$AP Rocky, 21 Savage) A$AP Rocky was also a part of HEROES & VILLAINS, providing voice lines and interludes throughout the album, and delivering an amazing verse on the final track, Feel the Fiyaaaah (with A$AP Rocky & feat. Takeoff). A$AP Rocky’s presence on the track could also be a nod to his longtime beef with Drake, who Future has fired multiple shots towards on both WE DON'T TRUST YOU and WE STILL DON'T TRUST YOU. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
